snippet.title: Elder Kings 2 - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Check out the EK2 Discord: https://discord.gg/elderkings
Check out EK2 on Twitter: https://twitter.com/ElderKingsCK3
Check out EK2's website: https://elderkings.com/
Check out the thread on paradoxforums: https://forum.paradoxplaza.com/forum/threads/wip-elder-kings.1415723/

Elder Kings 2 is a total conversion mod for Crusader Kings 3, based on the popular Elder Scrolls series and the Elder Scrolls Online MMO. From Yokuda to Morrowind, from Skyrim to Elsweyr, choose any feudal ruler to steer your dynasty through the turmoil of the Interregnum, a time without a Dragonborn Emperor on the Ruby Throne, starting from either 2E 440 or 2E 450.
Release: When it's done.

This is a project by fans, for fans. It is a fan mod created for Crusader Kings 3 and has no affiliation with Bethesda.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------
Music by S. Faustmann
The Elder Scrolls: AKAVIR (Fanmade Game Soundtrack)
https://youtu.be/CO7n1RCXquQ
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
Edited by Castox
Thumbnail by Hart

0:00 Tamriel - 9 Provinces & Papermap
0:19 Imperial City - This is the Year of Akatosh 440....
0:58 Troops - Orc, Dunmer & Nord Troops fighting
1:05 Terrain - Iliac Bay & Yokuda
1:20 Feature - Magic Interface
1:30 Feature - Patron Interface
1:36 Terrain - Craglorn
1:40 Terrain - Cyrodiil & Skyrim
1:53 Flavour - Direnni Hegemony
2:04 Flavour - Attrebus Events and Decisions
3:15 Terrain - War in Sentinel
3:24 Terrain - TES6 Teaser ;)
3:50 Terrain - Skyrim & Solitude
4:08 Endcard - Argonians!
